response.answer_text: Ariana Grande's music video of her chart topping single, “break up with your girlfriend, i'm bored”, sparked off rumors of her being bisexual. The song title might portray that she might be saying that to a girl whose boy she wants for herself, but in the music video of the song, she's shown kissing the girl by the end of it, in a swimming pool! But, a couple months later, she just finalised it herself with the buzz single “Monopoly”, a duet with Victoria Monét, with lyrics “I like women and men.”
